title: Display Quality Engineer
summary: Apple is looking for a world-class Display/Process/Quality Engineer to lead the engineering and manufacturing activities to launch the next-generation display technologies for the displays in award-winning Apple products.
description:
New Product Introduction:
- Acts as a leading engineer to drive overall quality system development, quality control tool development to deliver scalable product 
- Review product/process design documentations and specification documentations to ensure alignment with process capability and yield target 
- Present timely, concise reports or plan for product yield performance, specification convergence status; drive Failure Analysis (FA), Corrective Action implementation plan, and yield bridge to mass production 

Supplier Execution: 
- Review supplier’s quality control flow, in-process quality control system, incoming components and outgoing product’s quality control plan. Identify shortfalls and corrective actions to ensure design and yield target compliance. ... (truncated)
preferred_qualifications:
Proven ability to drive vendor in quality improvements, familiarity with quality control and monitoring systems.
Capability to execute DOE, SPC, failure analysis, and yield improvement.
Excellent written and verbal communication skill
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. ... (truncated)
